review: It doesn't work if your internet. Isn't fast enough.

review: Amazing.  It has and will continue to change the way we interface with entertainment.  We will no longer be tied to what and when network executives call entertainment.  Best purchase in years.

review: Easy set up, but I have to get used to the new screen appearance.  Very satisfied.

review: Great little device I was able to install without any assistance...
author: Helen Theaumont

review: Works fine.  Bought it specifically to watch Netflix on our flat screen TV without dragging wires everywhere.  Unfortunately,  it does need to be plugged into an outlet to work with our TV.
author: Claudia

review: Fire TV Stick would be ok if you did not have to pay for every single feature you want to use....very disappointing.

review: Great inexpensive gifts for the family! !

review: This is the best buy I have ever purchased.

review: We are so pleased with the quantity and quality of the movies, and shows we can download. Also it was easy to install, and very east to use. Love it!Amazon Fire TV Stick
